word: "Men and women are going forth more and more to carry the gospel message. We thank God for this, but we need a greater awakening. . . . It is our privilege to see the work of God advancing in the cities. Christ is waiting, waiting for places to be entered. Who are preparing for this work? We will not say that we are destitute of laborers. We are glad that there are some; but there is a greater, a far greater work to be done in our cities." [IDEM, P. 98.]
